description: The captain of the academy`s fencing team, Juri is one of Ootori`s most highly respected students, and even the teachers appear to be in awe of her. Her aloof, intimidating manner belies a dark secret. Of the http://anidb.net/ch9171 [Student Council] Duellists, she is thought to be the most noble, and thus the one with the most potential to become a Prince, but her nobility and the strength that comes with it are constantly undermined by her desires and despair. Her Duelling Rose is orange.
name: Arisugawa Juri
